dcterms:description: A database containing over 8 million points of interest (POIs) with visit patterns in the U.S., aggregated to the census tract level for constructing spatial flow networks.
dcterms:title: SafeGraph business venue database

dcterms:description: A source for building the spatial adjacency matrix based on geographic relationships among census tract boundaries.
dcterms:title: TIGER/Line Shapefiles

dcterms:description: A source for node attributes, providing demographic and socio-economic data including poverty population, race/ethnicity, and household income.
dcterms:title: U.S. Census American Community Survey (ACS) 2015-2019 5-year estimates

dcterms:creator: Mingjun Xiang
dcterms:description: An approach for urban land use detection by fusing multiple features, which is extended in this paper to indicate a category of methods generating latent feature representations based on regions' characteristics.
dcterms:title: Region2vec
